hero.title: Your website,
hero.subtitle: Hosting, updates & support included. Your own client portal for changes. Just run your business, we handle the rest.

benefits.title: Why choose a website subscription?
benefits.subtitle: No worries, no hassle. We take care of everything.

noInvestment.title: No large investment
noInvestment.description: No thousands upfront. Start immediately with a professional website for a fixed monthly fee.

alwaysUpToDate.title: Always up-to-date
alwaysUpToDate.description: We handle updates, security and backups. You focus on your business.

fastOnline.title: Online fast
fastOnline.description: Your website goes live within 2 weeks. Including mobile-friendly design.

support.title: Personal support
support.description: Direct contact with your own web designer. No call centers or long wait times.

flexible.title: Flexible adjustments
flexible.description: Want to change something? Small modifications are included. No extra costs.

noLock.title: No long contracts
noLock.description: Cancel monthly. You're not locked in.

howItWorks.title: Online in
howItWorks.subtitle: 4 simple steps to your new website

step1.title: Start your project
step1.description: Complete our smart wizard and get instant access to your own client portal with live project status.

step2.title: Design within 5 days
step2.description: You'll receive a fully designed mockup in your dashboard. Not satisfied? We'll adjust until it's perfect.

step3.title: Approve & go live
step3.description: Happy with the design? After payment, your website goes live immediately. Including hosting, SSL and domain.

step4.title: Ongoing support
step4.description: We remain your partner. Request changes, send messages ‚Äî all through your personal dashboard.

pricing.title: Transparent

website.2: Modern and clean design matching your brand

professional.name: Professional

website.1: Premium custom design by senior designer

testimonials.title: What customers say
testimonials.subtitle: Real reviews from entrepreneurs on Trustpilot

faq.title: Got questions?
faq.subtitle: Everything you want to know about our website subscriptions

costs.question: What are the startup costs?
costs.answer: For websites you pay a one-time startup fee from ‚Ç¨149, for webshops this is from ‚Ç¨299 (all prices incl. VAT). As a business owner, you can reclaim the 21% VAT on your tax return. After that, you only pay the monthly fee. Hosting, SSL certificate, domain management and maintenance are all included.

timeline.question: How long until my website is online?
timeline.answer: Your website will be online within 7 business days. After our first conversation, you'll receive an initial design within 5 days. After your approval, the website goes live immediately.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, after the first 3 months you can cancel monthly. We believe in our service and want you to stay because you're satisfied, not because you're locked into a contract.

changes.question: How many changes can I make per month?
changes.answer: This depends on your package. With Starter you can make 1 change per month, with Professional text changes are unlimited, and with Business you have full flexibility with a dedicated account manager.

domain.question: Can I use my own domain name?
domain.answer: Absolutely! You can use your existing domain or we'll help you register a new one. This is included in all packages.

satisfaction.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the design?
satisfaction.answer: You'll first receive a concept design for approval. We keep adjusting until you're 100% satisfied. Additionally, you have a 14-day money-back guarantee.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Start your professional website today. No risk, no startup costs.

paymentModal.title: Complete Payment
paymentModal.subtitle: Secure payment
paymentModal.monthlyNote: Monthly subscription starts after website delivery
paymentModal.cancelNote: Cancel monthly after 3 months. No hidden costs.

footer.description: Professional websites for entrepreneurs. No hassle, just a beautiful website that works.

default.title: Have your website built by
default.description: 50+ entrepreneurs preceded you. Professional design, blazing fast hosting and personal support. From ‚Ç¨119/month (incl. VAT).

webshop.title: Start selling
webshop.description: Professional webshop with payments, shipping and inventory management. We build, you sell. From ‚Ç¨399/month (incl. VAT).

logo.title: Give your brand a
logo.description: Unique logo design with 3 concepts and 2 revision rounds. Including all file formats. Ready within 2 weeks.

drone.title: Take your content to the
drone.description: Spectacular aerial footage of your business. 4K video, edited photos and fast delivery. All of the Netherlands.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have a question? We're happy to help!

hero.title: Let's
hero.subtitle: Have a question or want a website built? We always respond within 24 hours and love to help you out.

methods.title: Choose your
methods.subtitle: We're available through multiple channels. Choose what works best for you.

responseTime.a: Via WhatsApp we often respond within an hour. Emails are always answered within 24 hours on business days.

freeCall.q: Can I schedule a free consultation?
freeCall.a: Yes! We're happy to schedule a free video call to discuss your project. No obligations.

pricing.q: How much does a website cost?
pricing.a: Our subscriptions start from ‚Ç¨119/month (incl. VAT). As a business owner, you can reclaim the VAT on your tax return.

location.a: We're based in the Netherlands and work remotely. This way we can help clients throughout the Netherlands (and beyond).

timeline.q: How long does it take to build a website?
timeline.a: Most websites go live within 1-2 weeks. More complex projects may take 3-4 weeks.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Webstability, we value the protection of your personal data.

collect.title: What data do we collect?
collect.content: We collect data you provide to us, such as name, email, phone number and business information.

use.title: How do we use your data?
use.content: We use your data to provide our services, communication and improve our service.

share.title: Do we share your data?
share.content: We do not share your data with third parties unless necessary for our services.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct and delete your personal data.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about our privacy policy, please contact info@webstability.nl.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.content: In these terms, 'Webstability' means: the service provider; 'Customer': the purchaser of services.

services.title: Services
services.content: Webstability provides website design and development services on a subscription basis.

payment.title: Payment
payment.content: Payment is made monthly in advance via direct debit or invoice.

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.content: The subscription can be cancelled monthly with a notice period of 1 month.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: Webstability is not liable for indirect or consequential damages.

ip.title: Intellectual property
ip.content: After full payment, ownership of the website transfers to the customer.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This website uses cookies to improve your experience.

what.title: What are cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device.

types.title: What cookies do we use?
types.content: We use functional cookies, analytical cookies and marketing cookies.

manage.title: Managing cookies
manage.content: You can manage cookies through your browser settings.

delivery.title: Fast Delivery

flexible.title: Flexible Hours

helpCenter.title: Help & Support
helpCenter.subtitle: How can we help you?
helpCenter.contactIntro: Can't figure it out? Contact us.

tour.title: View the tour again?
tour.description: We'll show you step by step how everything works.

howLong.question: How long until my website is ready?
howLong.answer: The timeline depends on your chosen package. Starter: 5-7 business days, Professional: 7-10 business days, Business: 10-14 business days. This excludes time needed for your feedback and approval.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: Yes, after the first 3 months you can cancel monthly with 1 month notice. The first 3 months have a minimum term.

whatHappens.question: What happens when I cancel?
whatHappens.answer: When you cancel, your website will go offline after the notice period. You'll receive a backup of all content. The domain remains yours.

whatInfo.question: What information do I need to provide?
whatInfo.answer: We need: your business details, logo (if available), text for the website, photos of your work/team, and your style and color preferences.

noLogo.question: I don't have a logo yet, what now?
noLogo.answer: No problem! You can have a logo designed separately (‚Ç¨169) or we'll use a stylish text logo with your company name.

photoFormat.question: What format should my photos be?
photoFormat.answer: Provide photos in the highest possible quality, at least 1200px wide. JPG or PNG format. We'll optimize them for the web.

howFeedback.question: How do I give feedback on the design?
howFeedback.answer: Click "View design" to open the preview. You can indicate what you like or want to change per section. Be as specific as possible.

revisionRounds.question: How many revision rounds do I have?
revisionRounds.answer: The number of revisions depends on your package: Starter: 2 rounds, Professional: 4 rounds, Business: 6 rounds. Extra revisions can be purchased.

feedbackVsRevision.question: What's the difference between feedback and revision?
feedbackVsRevision.answer: Feedback is when you indicate what you want to change. Revision is when we implement those changes. Each feedback round counts as one revision.

paymentMethods.question: Which payment methods are accepted?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept iDEAL, credit card (Visa, Mastercard), bank transfer and Klarna (pay later).

subscriptionStart.question: When does my subscription start?
subscriptionStart.answer: Your monthly subscription starts on the day your website goes live. The one-time setup costs are paid in advance.

requestChange.question: How do I request a change?
requestChange.answer: Go to your dashboard and click "Request change". Describe what you want to change and optionally add a screenshot. We process changes within 48 hours.

changesPerMonth.question: How many changes can I request per month?
changesPerMonth.answer: This depends on your package: Starter: 2 changes, Professional & Business: unlimited. Major changes (new pages, features) are quoted separately.

selfEdit.question: Can I edit content myself?
selfEdit.answer: Currently we handle all changes for you. This ensures your website always looks professional. Self-management is in development.
